website_summaries.verdict: This innovative option pulls double-duty as a delicious treat and a perch.
pros: Flavored calcium and bee pollen construction entices birds to nibble and nip while they perch
Delivers a healthy dose of nutrients
Rough surface helps keep nails and beaks in tip top shape
Seeds can be placed the the gaps to encourage foraging
Available in varying sizes and flavors
cons: Understandably, this isn't the most durable perch

customer_reviews.title: FD&C Red #40, Blue#2 and propylene glycol :(
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun addition to our parrot cage. However, I wish they had used natural coloring and not fd&c red #40 and blue 2. Also some flavors contain propylene glycol as the “natural flavoring” which we didn’t notice until after purchase. I avoid ingredients like this for my children and pets so won’t be buying more of these until the ingredient list is CLEANED up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Chan

customer_reviews.title: My parakeets love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I think the original flavor I got was strawberry so trying a new flavor the one I received was grape. My birds have whittled the strawberry one down to a numb literally down to the metal post its made on. The old one was a little smaller than this one so i got a little bit bigger one so maybe they wont squabble as much seeing who gets to perch on it a they will all be able to as its longer than the small version. I will update as to the findings. I also purchased the kiwi flavored as well so we shall see if the is a flavor pref as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gina CentralTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Fun perch
customer_reviews.text: This perch is awesome! The holes don't go all the way through, easy to put seeds in it so my bird can pick them out. Also I love that it's kinda soft on her feet. It reminds me of hard chalk. I will definitely buy this again. I got the med size & it's perfect for my African Gray.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: My BlueFront loves these perches!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size for a medium size parrot, like a Blue Front, Yellow Nape, African Grey, etc. My parrot is rathe fussy and it was not within 12 hours he was already knowing at perch. It's pretty hard and takes some work to chip away at it. I have had it up a good month now and it's still got some more to go. I see that my parrot grinds down on it daily which is good to take up some time and gives your parrot some calcium. I bought two more immediately to have in reserve! Great perch for the money!
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Conure Can't Stop Eating It
customer_reviews.text: My conure loves it. We have the pale green color and it's a big hit. In fact, he loves it so much right now that he is not eating his breakfast. It has been in his cage for a week, but he didn't become obsessed with it until the past 24 hours. Hopefully, he will go back to eating a more balanced diet soon... So far, he hasn't touched his beak conditioner or the cuttlebone, so I think this gives him the opportunity to trim his beak while enjoying himself -- not to mention the nutritional benefits. I will definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome perches!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these perches for about 1 year now. The birds LUV them! They can grip onto the perch very easily because of the holes, and really enjoy destroying them when the mood suits them. They come in a variety of flavors, colors, and sizes. They're super easy to clean. I totally recommend getting them, especially if you have hookbeaks. You're birds will love them.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Medium perch is huge
customer_reviews.text: The medium perch is huge. I should have read the product details more carefully. Usually "medium" things for "medium sized birds" are appropriate for my Quaker parrot. The diameter is just way too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E

customer_reviews.title: Cute Perch
customer_reviews.text: I change out my perches often, so I try to have a wider variety for my little parrotlet. He was actually scared of this perch for the first few days but eventually warmed up to it. It's been in his cage for about a month now (so he can continue to get used to it). I expected him to chew on it, but I've yet to see that. I think this perch is great, my little Clyde just isn't so sure yet!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Spiker

customer_reviews.title: My cockatiels love it :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a little wider in diameter than I had thought, but my cockatiels still love it. It only took them maybe half a day to start using it. Their last mineral perch they completely annihilated so I'm hoping maybe this one will last a little bit longer due to the thickness.
customer_reviews.author: RCV3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I just got an African grey have many perches but he loves this one! He slept on it the last 3 nights and chews on it. I ordered a second today I like to spoil my child.
customer_reviews.author: Retro gamer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, hard to get a specific flavor
customer_reviews.text: My conure loves these perches. I wanted to purchase again in another flavor, had grape... talked to customer service for 20 minutes just to request the watermelon flavor and received kiwi-lime. Not worth the hassle to return or exchange, so he seems to like this one as well. But will probably not order this product from amazon again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Artificial flavoring and food coloring!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the ingredients on the packaging, I sent it back. I have experienced anaphylaxis from Red Dye #40 and I certainly wouldn't give it to my pet bird! Strongly suggest against using this if you value your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Bird

customer_reviews.title: Fun perch for hiding treats
customer_reviews.text: I put this perch in my Jenday Conure's enclosure and tucked a few seeds inside the holes. He pounced on it and had a really good time searching out treats. He nibbles on the end and rubs his beak along the sides to condition it. It has a pretty big diameter, but the holes in it make clinging to it easy. The bright color is attractive to my bird, he spends a lot of time exploring the holes. It would probably be a bit heavy for the smaller wire cage bars, but the wrought iron bars hold it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: L M Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Perch for large parrot
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a "grooming" perch for my companion parrot when I bought this. I think that it will do a good job as far as nail grooming goes, however the perch was crushed on one end when I received it. Also make sure that you order the correct size for your bird!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Polly's Tooty Fruity Pollen Bird Perch, Medium
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves this perch. He loves to perch on it and chew it. I bought the pink medium and it is large. Do not try to clean with water because it starts to dissolve. Use a stiff brush instead. I also bought the pink clam perch by the same company and he loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Aloe Marlothii

customer_reviews.title: Love pollen bird perch
customer_reviews.text: This medium size pollen perch is good for sun conures, Indian Ringneck or amazon sized birds. It is good on their feet and provides a healthy nibble. Perch is sturdy and i clean with a damp paper towel. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BecsFL

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have two conures and this perch is their largest one. Since it was a calcium perch I was nervous that it would arrive damaged but it arrived quickly and with no damage. They took to the perch quickly and my birds like to rub their beak on it but don't chew on it yet. I had another edible perch and it took them two months before they even realized it was edible so be patient. A wonderful product that I would defiantly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good size for small to medium size birds.
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiel likes the perch, and happily chews on it. At first I thought it would be too think as a perch, but he likes sitting on it so all’s good. The metal attachments work well for mounting it on the cage bars.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Bratzel

customer_reviews.title: Great perch, supplement and forager ALL IN ONE
customer_reviews.text: I really love this perch. It's a different surface with texture to vary in the cage, made of calcium so it's good for parrots to chew, fully digestible, and the holes make it a great foraging toy. I put pellets and seeds in it and my Quaker loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JNNY

customer_reviews.title: The medium seems to be a great size for him to be able to pull little ...
customer_reviews.text: My brown headed parrot loves these perches.. The medium seems to be a great size for him to be able to pull little treats from the holes along the outside, and the small one is perfect for him to sit on while he sleeps. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ZeroGravityX

customer_reviews.title: Washer is to small
customer_reviews.text: The washer that came with the perch was to small. Every time I hung it in cage. The washer width was to small and the cage would not support it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rae

customer_reviews.title: I wish he loved it less
customer_reviews.text: My Senegal loves this, I wish he loved it less. There is metal running through this so I change it out as soon as I think he's getting too close to the bolt. It usually lasts quite a while, but I look it over daily.
customer_reviews.author: KGee

customer_reviews.title: All our birds love these perches but especially the Kiwi
customer_reviews.text: All our birds love these perches but especially the Kiwi. They use to clean their beaks after meals, forage for treats and the females devour it when coming into breeding condition. Great all around perch wish they gave discounts in bulk as we have lots of birds. Budgies, Parrotlet, Lady Gouldians and Quaker all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bird liked it. Bigger than I wanted, I have small conure, got medium, could have done small. Nice big washers.
customer_reviews.author: TToka

customer_reviews.title: My cockatiels love it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2, both arrived in good condition. I've been buying this brand of perch for years and my birds love sleeping on and eating them! Medium is the perfect size for cockatiels.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn F

customer_reviews.title: Cockatoos chew these to bits
customer_reviews.text: My Goffin goes through these almost as fast as I can put them into her cage. She adores them.
customer_reviews.author: Ceruleanverde

customer_reviews.title: My Quaker loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Quaker parrot! He loves the flavor and its great for his claws and beak. Definitely for medium to large birds. Will definitely get another when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Viki

customer_reviews.title: Green cheek conure loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for each of his cages (3) and he loves them. I like that they can gnaw on them and get vitamins/minerals. Good price on amazon, too.
customer_reviews.author: CareyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Birds love it
customer_reviews.text: Its great, birds are using it both as a perch and to chew on. Its nice they leave cleaning instructions as ive already had to clean it due to birds pooing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Saka_Sandora

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: omg Ziggy chews on this FAITHFULLY 😬 totally recommend even for a budgie
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: My birdies love it
customer_reviews.text: I have this in the green color for my cockatiels and they love it. Not sure what flavor it is, they chew on it all day. Will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: DukeDiesel

customer_reviews.title: Durable nice perch as long as they don't chew it
customer_reviews.text: A little on the big side for a medium. I have bought this kind several times. I have from green cheeks to Pionus. Works great. They do chew then after a while ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kicker1015

customer_reviews.title: Conure loves the medium size for resting perch
customer_reviews.text: Conure refuses scuttle bones but enjoys the flavored perch (goofy grape) and is larger than her usual perches so she can sit without holding on tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parrots love it.
customer_reviews.text: My parrots love eating, cleaning their beaks, standing on these perches, I always buy them.
customer_reviews.author: MAF

customer_reviews.title: Wish u could pick flavors
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a variety of flavors but all I recieved was one lime (bird loved) that and the rest where grape my bird doesn't care for it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, pretty too
customer_reviews.text: My little bird likes her new perch. Arrived fast, passed well
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with shape
customer_reviews.text: The perch was not at all straight as pictured , and as I’ve bought them before with no problem like this, I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: My parakeets love it.
customer_reviews.text: It will last a good long time. Plus it's purple 😊
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not for big birds
customer_reviews.text: My Macaw loved it but had it used in 2 days. Would stay on cage and didnt like the fact a metal rod went through the whole perch.
customer_reviews.author: Amy King

customer_reviews.title: came a bit damaged
customer_reviews.text: product is great and exactly what i ordered but it came cracked and some of it broke apart
customer_reviews.author: Lugos natural stone work

customer_reviews.title: My birds love it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better fun perches I have bought. The canary winged parakeets have enjoyed chewing it. It has lasted months. And it easily, securely attaches to the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Nursebeanpole

customer_reviews.title: Recently rescued a Gold capped conure and he keeps going into the cockatoos cage and loves this perch and I am here looking for
customer_reviews.text: This perch was purchased for my rescued cockatoo and I was setting up his cage. This perch has been in his cage and he uses this one as his sleeping perch. Recently rescued a Gold capped conure and he keeps going into the cockatoos cage and loves this perch and I am here looking for these perches as this one appears to be the best one in the bird cage.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: One arrived broken and the other cracked easily. If you tighten these on at all they will crack. I don't feel safe having these with my bird. I would not trust these for any bird larger than a cockatiel or similar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picky bird loves it
customer_reviews.text: My bird is picky and he loves this perch! He chews on it and sharpens his beck on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jebby

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, in good shape. Our lovebird likes it. Not a bad price.
customer_reviews.author: Walter A. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My Amazon parrot loves this. She sits on it and rubs her beak over and over again. I have several perches for her, and she much prefers this one. The price was also great, which allowed me to purchase several for her.
customer_reviews.author: Winters Family

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My Cokateil love this. He sits on it and is able to rest his feet because the perch is so large. His feet are almost flat on it which is great. He loves scratching his beak and eating the perch. It lasts a long time and isn't too messy. I'll definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a day
customer_reviews.text: This perch didn't hold up at all. It was completely destroyed in one day. I mean GONE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bird pollen perch
customer_reviews.text: I have a conure who can no longer grip a regular perch. These are so nice for her
customer_reviews.author: pep79

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My African grey Congo loves them to much she eats them up.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Happy to know that she will get nutrients once she ...
customer_reviews.text: She has yet to figure out that she can eat this but is still a baby. I will have to move it to a higher traffic location of her cage. Happy to know that she will get nutrients once she does get to nibbling on this.
customer_reviews.author: ACS

customer_reviews.title: They break too easy
customer_reviews.text: These breaks way too easily. One was destroyed by first bird in like 2 minutes. I used pieces that broke for some birds for beak sharpening. If you tighten these too much they also break. One bird was actually afraid of this one and would not go near it. I moved to another. Only one of 3 is still intact and they are not eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My cocktail loves it. There was a glitch on the site when I purchased 2 so wasn’t able to get them in different flavors. They have a little smell but I guess that’s why 🦅 love them.
customer_reviews.author: nikiba johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Nice green color and sturdy for African grey to use
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: ... they can chew it (which is healthy) It's a great textured foot exercise bar as well
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in the cage for over a month and they are just starting to realize they can chew it (which is healthy) It's a great textured foot exercise bar as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for bird
customer_reviews.text: Second one I purchased. My Amazon loves them. Last long time, great value for price. Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Beak File
customer_reviews.text: My Eclectus loves to chew on this perch and it keeps his beak absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ShellRose

customer_reviews.title: birds don't care for this
customer_reviews.text: the medium size is HUGE. the perch is also VERY heavy. my birds will sit on it sometimes but they don't chew it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Breakfast Princess

customer_reviews.title: my budgies love picking oat groats/seeds out of the holes
customer_reviews.text: my budgies love picking oat groats/seeds out of the holes, they spend lots of time chewing and trying to get treats out. I feel great that I provided them with such a nutritious toy!
customer_reviews.author: Angeline

customer_reviews.title: Not going to fault the product for my bird's picky ...
customer_reviews.text: Not going to fault the product for my bird's picky behavior. I still haven't found anything she will chew on to trim her beak but she likes it for a perch.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Hays

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: Went to petsupermarket and found these for $10, checked Amazon and sure enough they were cheaper. Highly reccomend. My parakeets love it.
customer_reviews.author: James Maddison

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have spooky birds, & they were afraid of it (change) But they are coming along with it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane R CaseTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. my sun conure rather sits and clean her beak off on it rather then eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but a little rough on those little feet : (
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Perch
customer_reviews.text: My bird doesn't like this too much. Hardly used it.
customer_reviews.author: Chancy

customer_reviews.title: Took a while for my grey to warm up to ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a while for my grey to warm up to this but she loves it now. Will have to buy another one in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Great Perch
customer_reviews.text: This perch is very easy to attach into a cage. Our bird loves to hang out on it on it and nibble when he feels like it. This will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Happily anonymous

customer_reviews.title: if you have a bird the size of a Senegal parrot this would be a great size to get
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because the first one was too small.he loves them.if you have a bird the size of a Senegal parrot this would be a great size to get!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great perch at good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great perch at a good price! Would recommend this perch.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D. Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: tooty fruity bird perch
customer_reviews.text: My African grey was afraid of this at first but now loves it. Good purchase. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use it. It broke into pieces when I was screwing it on the cage. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sprinkles loves this perch. I call it her sleepy perch because it's the only one she'll sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Kate H

customer_reviews.title: Birds like them!!!
customer_reviews.text: My birds like the perches. It took them a while to get used to them but they enjoy now. We have two cockatiels.
customer_reviews.author: BoDi

customer_reviews.title: Bird doesn't eat the perch or scratch his beak on it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would help get my Conure's beak buffed down. It did not do that unfortunately. I have ground up nuts and packed all of the holes and he just uses his tongue and sharp talon like beak to pick the nuts out. He doesn't eat the perch either as advertised. Maybe you will have better results.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Petrovich

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: For a very large macaw, not for any small bird as advertised. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: janh

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for the strawberry one, asmy bird is very picky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quaker parrot loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Quaker parrot seems to really like! She got the watermelon flavored one. Goes back to taste it, chew on it several times in her day and keeps her busy, so that works for us! I could have gone with the small..we got the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Stavis Bay USA

customer_reviews.title: Love these perches and flavors
customer_reviews.text: Love the perch. My birds enjoy cleaning their beaks and chewing on them.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

product_meta.title: Polly's Tooty Fruity Pollen Bird Perch, Medium
product_meta.description: Polly's Tooty Fruity Perch Medium is approximately 1.5 inches in diameter by 9 inches long. This perch is designed for the medium bird breeds. Please specify your flavor: Grape, Kiwi-Lime or Watermelon. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Comes in three great flavors: Grape, Kiwi Lime and Watermelon
Made with real bee pollen and 100-Percent digestible ground Calcium
Transforms edible perch into a dietary supplement

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
